Lim Jisoo

Introduction

Lim Jisoo, also known as Lim Ji Soo or Joanna Lim, is a singer-songwriter from South Korea signed to Favor Entertainment. She is a member of AGAPAO Worship, which includes W24 and other artists. She released her first solo single, "Monologue", on January 4, 2021.

She was the winner of Channel A’s Vocal Play 2 in 2019 as a Berklee College of Music student.

She also made it to the top 25 of TV Chosun’s Kookmin Singer in 2021 and made a guest appearance on its spin-off show, A Call from the Nation, in 2022.

She performed as Singer No.27 on JTBC's Sing Again 3 from November 2023 to January 2024, and finished in the top 10 semi final round.

Fun facts

1
Lim Jisoo performed "When We Were Young" (by Adele) for her Berklee College of Music audition and uploaded her cover of the song and "Easy on Me" on her YouTube channel.
…
2
Lim Jisoo won Channel A's survival show Vocal Play 2: Campus Music Olympiad in 2019 after performing "Radioactive" (by Imagine Dragons), "woo ah" (by Crush) with Kim Minseo, "Tears" (by Lee So Ra) with Nah Sanghyun of Band Nah & Kim Youngheum, "Twenty-three" (by IU), "To Make You Feel My Love" (by Bob Dylan), "Faith" (by Stevie Wonder & Ariana Grande), "You Say" (by Lauren Daigle), and "Flashlight" (by Jessie J).
…
3
Lim Jisoo performed "Diamond" (Itaewon Class OST by Ha Hyun Woo of Guckkasten), "Someone's Dream" (by Spring Summer Autumn Winter / SSaW) with Kim Donghyun & Lee Solomon, and "Yes I Am" (by MAMAMOO) with Onestar, Ryu Youngchae, Lee Ju Chun, Kim Seongjun, and Yoo Seulgi during episode 27 of TV Chosun's variety show A Call from the Nation in 2022.
…
4
Lim Jisoo performed "Lucille" (by Han Young Ae) and "Humility Is Hard" (by Cho Young Nam) during episode 11 of JTBC's Sing Again 3 on January 4, 2024.
…
5
Lim Jisoo performed "Till The End Of Time" (Another Miss Oh OST by The Black Skirts) during episode 3 of JTBC's Sing Again 3 on November 9, 2023.
…
6
Lim Jisoo performed her song "UP&DOWN" during episode 10 of JTBC's Sing Again 3 on December 28, 2023.
…
7
Lim Jisoo performed "Purely and Fragrantly" (by Kim Kwang Seok) during episode 9 of JTBC's Sing Again 3 on December 21, 2023.
…
8
Lim Jisoo performed "Make Up" (by Sam Kim & Crush) during episode 6 of JTBC's Sing Again 3 on November 30, 2023.
…
9
Lim Jisoo performed "Valenti" (by BoA) with Zhang Liyin during episode 5 of JTBC's Sing Again 3 on November 23, 2023.
…
10
Lim Jisoo participated as the singer of the OST song "Never Again" for the 2024 MBC drama "Wonderful World" that played during the ending credits of episode 1, the preview for episode 2, and the preview for episode 3.
…
